Rulings.Tengu:
●De-Synchro targets 1 face-up Synchro Monster.
●If a Synchro Material Monster used in the Synchro Summon is removed from the GY, it cannot be Special Summoned with De-Synchro, even if it is returned to the GY.

Rulings.Cat:

Rulings.Base: 1. "De-Synchro" targets 1 face-up Synchro Monster.\n2. If a Synchro Material Monster used in the Synchro Summon is removed from the GY, it cannot be Special Summoned with "De-Synchro", even if it is returned to the GY.
